H0.text: Day is the period during which the Moon revolves around Earth about once every day.

H1.text: Year is the period for the Moon to revolve around Earth about once.

H2.text: The Moon revolves around Earth about once every week.

H3.text: Month is the period in which the Moon revolves around Earth about once.

A4.text: Moon completes an orbit (lunar month) in relation to Earth and the Sun (synodically) every 29.5 days.

A5.text: The Moon completes an orbit around Earth every 27.3 days.
